author: ryanleeschneider
content: Will we expect to see any traffic over the `engine_` RPC channel before the merge?  As a node operator it'd be nice to know that that channel is alive and well since I imagine we'll deploy the merge-compatible layout weeks before the actual merge, ideally there'd be some sort of no-op message we could periodically or on-demand trigger to know that the CL and EL are still connected to one another.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: It could also maybe confirm that the two endpoints agree on chainId, TTD and some other basic sanity checks (edit: and merge spec "version").
